Component.Name: CDPEventSubscriber
Component.Description: Subscribes to event providers. Can subscribe to different providers, such as CDPEventNodes and CDPEventLoggers.

Parameter.Name: ExtendedUpdateRequestPeriod
Parameter.Description: Cyclic periodic time to retrieve extended information if the information does not already exist in local DB.

Parameter.Name: SubscriptConfirmationPeriod
Parameter.Description: Cyclic periodic time to resend subscription request to former unconfirmed subscriptions requests.

Parameter.Name: SubscriptionUpdatePeriod
Parameter.Description: Cyclic periodic time to send subscription request to configured providers. (refresh of subscription)

Parameter.Name: Log events to file
Parameter.Description: Specifies whether events should be logged to file.

Parameter.Name: MaxHistoryEventListSize
Parameter.Description: Specifies the max size of the History Event List. The oldest events are removed if limit is reached.

Timer.Name: ExtendedUpdateRequestPeriodTimer
Timer.Description: Timer used to retrieve extended information. Period is configured in Parameter ExtendedUpdateRequestPeriod.

Timer.Name: SubscriptConfirmationPeriodTimer
Timer.Description: Timer used to resend subscription request to former unconfirmed subscriptions requests. Period is configured in Parameter SubscriptConfirmationPeriod.

Timer.Name: SubscriptionUpdatePeriodTimer
Timer.Description: Timer used to send subscription request to configured providers. Period is configured in Parameter SubscriptionUpdatePeriod.
